title: Norman Solomon: The Ukraine War and the Madness of Militarism
itunes:title: Norman Solomon: The Ukraine War and the Madness of Militarism
description: Author and peace activist Norman Solomon talks about the double standards in US foreign policy that have smoothed the path for Russia's inexcusable invasion of Ukraine. The role of the military-industrial-complex in the US is one of the main reasons we lack a single standard for the use of military force and human rights, says Solomon.
